titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Tuesday the twentieth day of October, 1696
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Informing Parliament that the King is confident they will provide sufficient funds to continue to finance the war.
Reproduction of the original at the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
